p:
The black-sky albedo and the white-sky albedo were also obtained from GLASS dataset. The V1.0 GLASS albedo product provides a long-time series of high-quality, gap-filled, 8-day global 0.05° albedo map from 1981 to 2012
63 . The solar zenith angle (SEA) data was stemmed from the daily global 0.05° resolution surface reflectance datasets ( https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdr/terrestrial/avhrr-surface-reflectance) from AVHRR Long Term Data Record (LTDR). In order to unify the different time scales of multiple datasets and work out non-temporal data missing, we averaged daily SZA to obtain 8-daily data.
